article: My name is Carla and I  have got  two sisters, Grace and Alice. We like hamburgers for lunch. Grace and  _  like French fries,  _  Alice doesn't. I  don't like  eggs for dinner, but Grace and Alice like eggs. I really like chicken and vegetables. My parents like vegetables,  _  . So there are always  _  vegetables  _  the fridge. We think  apples  are good for our health. We each eat one every day. But there  _  any apples today. So I will go to the shop with my mother  _  school.
